transcript: when I had the gym I did six and then I did 30 plus turnarounds before I ever made a single piece of content like how you could run a gym better I feel confident in saying like these things work better than these ones I wanted to over credentialize myself for whatever content I was going to make so that I felt like I could take whatever heat someone was going to throw at me because I'd be like well here's why I think that like here's my evidence and I think that approach has been good it just takes longer like I could have shortcut after one gym and been like here's how you run a gym but like I wouldn't have known what it looks like to go into a Latino Market or in an Asian market or a black market or a North Market or a South Market or a Canadian Market or a UK Market or you know what I mean
